text: Gambling is a 1934 American crime film directed by Rowland V. Lee and written by Garrett Graham. It is based on the 1929 play Gambling by George M. Cohan. The film stars George M. Cohan, Wynne Gibson, Dorothy Burgess, Theodore Newton, Harold Healy and Walter Gilbert. The film was released on November 3, 1934, by Fox Film Corporation. ==Plot== ==Cast== *George M. Cohan as Al Draper *Wynne Gibson as Maizie Fuller *Dorothy Burgess as Dorothy Kane *Theodore Newton as Ray Braddock *Harold Healy as Ben Connolly *Walter Gilbert as Insp. Freelock *Cora Witherspoon as Mrs. Edna Seeley *Joseph Allen Sr. as Joe *Percy Ames as Mr. B *Six Spirits of Rhythm as Speciality Number ==References== ==External links== * Category:1934 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American crime films Category:1934 crime films Category:Fox Film films Category:Films directed by Rowland V. Lee Category:American black-and-white films
title: Gambling (film)
